backend/main.mo: Core backend actor managing user approval, access control, profiles, and request identifiers with persistent state and migration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module copying old actor state to the new state without structural changes.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend source files describing components, hooks, pages, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and component layers defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling identity, approval flow, and routing with pending request cleanup.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin-only routes by checking admin status and redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessStatus.ts: React Query hook fetching approval and admin status from the backend, tied to identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, approval workflows, and admin actions using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPendingScreen.t: UI for submitting and tracking access approval requests with local persistence and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin UI showing pending approvals and approved users with actions to approve, reject, or modify roles.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Main home UI showing modules, logout, announcements, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/modules/FrieslandFung: Placeholder module page with basic layout and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/modules/LandVanOns.ts: React page showing a styled placeholder module screen for Land van Ons with a back button and static text.
frontend/src/pages/modules/Pottle.tsx: React page displaying a styled placeholder module screen for Pottle with a back button and basic placeholder content.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Defines the TanStack router setup with routes for home, module pages, and an admin route guarded by AdminGuard.
Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing pending access request data in localStorage tied to a principal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and containers while enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, issues, architectural notes, and versioned state for an employee access app.
